named-query.name: group
named-query.query: select u.lastname, count(u) from User u group by u.lastname

named-query.name: average
named-query.query: select i.name, avg(b.amount) from Bid b join b.item i group by i.name

named-query.name: averageIllegal
named-query.query: select i, avg(b.amount) from Bid b join b.item i group by i

named-query.name: averageWorkaround
named-query.query: select i, avg(b.amount) from Bid b join b.item i group by i.id, i.name, i.createdOn, i.auctionEnd, i.auctionType, i.approved, i.buyNowPrice, i.seller

named-query.name: having
named-query.query: select u.lastname, count(u) from User u group by u.lastname having u.lastname like 'D%'
